video.description:
Work re-imagines the familiar image of people commuting to work as a moving portrait.

This video is the result of the hard work and collaboration of many intelligent, strong and compassionate women, genderqueer and trans folks close to Charlotte, myself and our crew, who invited their friends, family and complete strangers to come together in support of one another with love, warmth and hope.

Buy/Stream: 'CDW' : http://charlottedaywilson.com

Director: Fantavious Fritz
Executive Producers: Harland Weiss, Donovan Boden, Isil Gilderdale
Producers: Jason Aita, Daiva Zalnieriunas
Director of Photography: Kelly Jeffrey 
1st Assistant Camera: Marianna Margaret
2nd Assistant Camera / Loader: Tommy 'Gerbo' Keith
B-Camera: Eric Rowe
Gaffer: Alex Poutanien
Key Grip: Josh Daniels
Swing: Andrew Park
Stylist: Basia Wyszynski
Stylist Assistant: Todd Bolton
Makeup: Bianca Harris
1st Assistant Director: Olga Abrmamowicz
2nd Assistant Director: Deja Grubisic
Production Co-ordinator: Emily Harris
Talent Wrangler: Tessla Stuckey
Production Assistant: Reilly Day 
Production Assistant: Ryan Flannery
Film Development / Processing: MELS Montreal
Color Services Provided by: Alter Ego
Colorist: Conor Fisher
Finishing Services Provided by: Pixel Underground
Special Thank You to Sandy Tsilris and staff from the Toronto Transit Commission 
An OPC Production

Produced with the financial assistance of MuchFACT, a division of Bell Media Inc. www.muchfact.ca

video.description:

Starring Nikita

Directed by Fantavious Fritz

Produced by Jason Aita

Cinematography by Kelly Jeffrey & Fantavious Fritz

Edited by Fantavious Fritz

Colorist
Conor Fisher

video.description:
Deep in the mountain fjords of the war torn country of Craulor Badbadnotgood and Kaytranada find themselves trapped in the underground lair of the evil lord Dufarge, shackled to the dungeon floor and left for dead...

Directed by Fantavious Fritz

Written by Connor Crawford & Fantavious Fritz

Produced by Jason Aita

Executive Producers Harland Weiss, Donovan Boden & Isil Gilderdale

Cinematography by Kelly Jeffrey

Production Design by Erika Lobko

Props Buyer, Matthew Birch

Set Dresser, Danielle Nemet

Edited by Fantavious Fritz & Connor Crawford

Makeup & Hair SFX, Brandi Boulet

1st Assistant Camera, Filip Funk

2nd Assistant Camera, Tommy ‘Gerbo’ Keith

Gaffer, Rico Moran

Production Coordinator, Haley Vickers

SFX by Arrow Studio

Colorist, Conor Fisher

Special Thanks, John Dempsey, Daiva Zalnieriunas, Kyle Gregory Sanderson, Mike

Kniazeff, Reel Good Film, Mels Studios, Alter Ego, Matthew Langille

John's website: http://www.dmforhire.com/

SLAMDANCE 2016

Maryland Film Festival 2016
New Orleans Film Festival 2016

A super misleading trailer for LEWIS:

A missing cat witnesses the intersections of human life in a neighbourhood and meets a Lithuanian widow living out her final days.

2015 • 14 minutes • 35mm Colour • 1.78:1 • Stereo • English • Canada
Starring ALDONA ZALNIERIUNAS & JEAN LUC PICARD (the cat)
Written & Directed by FANTAVIOUS FRITZ
Produced by DAIVA ZALNIERIUNAS & JASON AITA
Cinematographer KELLY JEFFREY
Assistant Director BEN PETRIE
Production Design MATTHEW BIANCHI
Sound Recordist AARON MIRKIN
Edit & Sound Design F F
Loader KYLE SANDERSON
Executive Producer DAN BEKERMAN
Produced with financial assistance of The Harold Greenburg Shorts-to-Features Program
F F FILMS INC. 2015
